entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, and he is being addressed by others. He is described as looking furiously at Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who tries to soothe him. She speaks to the group on Harry's behalf.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a friend of Harry's who greets him warmly and takes a seat opposite Harry.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a friend of Ron's who smiles at Harry but gives him a mistrustful look.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's and Cho's who sits next to Hermione.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is a friend of the group who gazed dreamily into space.

relationships.description: Hermione tries to soothe Harry and speaks on his behalf.
